articles.title: What My 6-Year-Old Son and I Endured in Family Detention
articles.description: A dormitory in the Artesia Family Residential Center, a federal detention facility for undocumented immigrant mothers and children in Artesia, N.M., in 2014.

articles.title: Trump Is Trying to Find a Legal Way to Lock Up Even More Immigrant Families
articles.description: There’s still widespread uncertainty about how exactly the executive order signed by President Donald Trump on Wednesday will change his policy of separating and detaining immigrant families. But one thing is clear: If the White House can’t deter or deport fa…

articles.author: Samuel Gilbert in Santa Fe, New Mexico
articles.title: The lasting impact of detention on immigrant children: 'He relives it all again'
articles.description: As the US looks to extend the time children can be held, former detainees discuss their harrowing experiences The first memory Hilda Ramírez has of the United States is the sound of helicopters. Four years ago, she, her eight-year-old son, Ivan, and five othe…

articles.author: John Burnett
articles.title: The U.S. Has A Long, Troubled History Of Detaining Families Together
articles.description: Now that President Trump no longer can separate migrant families detained at the border, his administration is preparing to lock them up together — an arrangement with many critics and legal limits.

articles.author: John Stanton
articles.title: So Many Father-Led Families Are Crossing The US Border That Immigration Agents Don’t Have Room To Hold Them
articles.description: Activists say the jump in dads and kids is a result of a US crackdown on moms crossing the border with children. “We see as many fathers with children as pregnant women or moms with kids. It used to be so rare,” said one immigrant service provider. View Entir…

articles.author: Melanie Curry
articles.title: As Transit Expands in Los Angeles, Will Walkability Follow?
articles.description: Even as the region's rail network grows, too many stations remain engulfed by single-family housing and park-and-ride lots.
